summary: A trio of thieves plot to steal a town's silver shipment but a turn of events makes them the town's heroes.
cast: Lee Van Cleef|Antonio Sabato|Gordon Mitchell|Lionel Stander|Bud Spencer|Graziella Granata|Herbert Fux|Carlo Gaddi|Ann Smyrner|Enzo Fiermonte|Hans Elwenspoek|Adriana Facchetti|Romano Puppo|Günther Stoll|Valentina Arrigoni|Ferdinando Poggi|Nino Nini|Salvatore Billa|Sergio Ferrero|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Giuseppe Castellano|Enrico Chiappafreddo|Alberigo Donadeo|Al Hoosmann|Mickey Knox|Sergio Ukmar
title: Más allá de la ley
